People: Matthew Reinbold

Last Week

Matthew Reinbold

  • Fri, Oct 29, 2021 - The reason digital transformation efforts fail so often is that it is so much more than buying some software licenses or attending an offsite. Success requires understanding, dismantling, and rebuilding systems of power. Too many are poorly equipped for that work.
  • Thu, Oct 28, 2021 - With a record number of responses, the @getpostman's 2021 State of API Report is the largest looks at the API Economy to date. Check out the insights here: https://t.co/bpPmD0EhEH https://t.co/DuVIyDTwU5
  • Wed, Oct 27, 2021 - Net API Notes #179: * Omer Primor on Securing the #API Lifecycle * @dret and @programmingart on HTTP/3's API Impact * @launchany on getting Style Guides *used* That and more: https://t.co/svf9rFOn5G https://t.co/RKn6yzcLBM

Last Month

Matthew Reinbold

  • Thu, Oct 21, 2021 - On #API_governance: "Throwing seeds on the ground and coming back months later expecting something to harvest isn't statistically likely. And micro-managing the interplay between the numerous participants in such a complex environment also doesn't scale." https://t.co/3NKkUdHK5r https://t.co/XUnhknnh60
  • Fri, Oct 15, 2021 - One more before the weekend. I should resolve to write no more new stuff until the end of the year so that I have to shape up and publish what is lying around. Always more fun starting something new than wrestling with final forms, though. https://t.co/lrj8a4WYOz
  • Fri, Oct 15, 2021 - Working on a huge, months-long project that has me going back to the draft vault and rediscovering all sorts of stuff that never made it out. I can't wait until I can talk more about it! #software_architecture #APIs #api_governance https://t.co/W72JrcWHZA
  • Fri, Oct 15, 2021 - Heading into the weekend, what is your favorite #API product design technique? What best illuminates a domain and provides alignment? Which techniques or tools am I missing (would have included Sagas, but Twitter polls only allow 4 options)?
  • Wed, Oct 13, 2021 - New Notes! * The business case for #microservices applying Conway's Law * #GraphQL not for external use? * API Design checklist from @funcOfJoe That and more: https://t.co/AwB8unYG5o https://t.co/OVDWWCH3tk
  • Thu, Oct 07, 2021 - Amazon's Inconsistency Invites Imitation: https://t.co/g8DYLRkmaL A new Net #API Notes triggered by @donkersgood's recent @DuckbillGroup piece. https://t.co/vkYTdjvllg
  • Tue, Oct 05, 2021 - Defining some terms (cont.) * API First - Requiring that a web interface is the primary (and usually only) way data and functionality is exposed to a wider system * API Design First- Requiring that the API Design happens entirely before development occurs
  • Tue, Oct 05, 2021 - Defining some terms: * Digitization: Doing what you do but with greater efficiency and/or automation due to software * Digital Transformation: Flexibility to realign people, processes, and tech to harness *NEW* emergent opportunities at a rate of change similar to software
